items.title: This Samsung Odyssey gaming monitor lets you pick between 4K 180Hz/FHD 360Hz modes, and it just hit $400 all-time low
items.summary:
Amazon has been dishing out some solid deals on Samsung’s Odyssey gaming monitors over the last few days, and the latest one to go on sale is the brand’s 27-inch 4K Odyssey dual mode model that’s down to $399.99 shipped. This is a relatively new model that has only been out for a couple of months now, compared to some other discounted Odyssey displays. It typically goes for $600, so you’re looking at a straight-up $200 on it right now. Today’s deal lands it $50 below its previous all-time low from when it hit $450 last year during the Black Friday sale. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this display, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.summary:

This is the latest of Anker’s power bank solutions for your personal devices that released back towards the end of November with a $180 MSRP, and has seen discounts having gone as low as $120 during Black Friday. Today’s deal strikes $30 off the going rate and landing it $30 above the lowest price we have tracked. You can learn more about it below or within our hands-on review from 9to5Mac.

items.summary:
BougeRV Portable Camping Area Light

Buy for $24 (Reg. $40)

What we love

Many folks are heading out or prepping for upcoming camping trips across multiple seasons, and this BougeRV portable area light is a great little device to have handy – coming in four colorways, too. The 3,200mAh battery can keep it running for up to 6 nights before needing to recharge, and can even double as a compact power bank for your phone if needed. There are five adjustable brightness levels and four lighting modes to cover all your needs, including an S.O.S. mode and an auto-on feature that can be switched on or off.

items.title: Google now offers free SAT practice exams, powered by Gemini
items.summary: Students can prompt Gemini by typing "I want to take a practice SAT test,” and the AI will provide them with a free practice exam.
